overview: Love and friendship take center stage in these sweet stories. Angelina and Polly uncover the mystery of Angelina’s secret admirer with some help from their friends. Angelina and Alice help Marco realize that it’s more important to go against the grain if it means helping his friends. The students celebrate Ms. Mimi and although it may have been for the wrong reason, they do it with a lot of heart! And when Angelina and her girlfriends try to make a girls’ club, they realize a friendship club is much sweeter.
title: Angelina Ballerina: Sweet Valentine
